results.title: Tesla Statistics, Facts, Strategy, Products and Services
results.content: * Tesla, Inc. is headquartered in Austin, Texas, and is a vertically-integrated company designing, building, selling, and servicing electric vehicles and energy products. * In **2024**, Tesla recorded total revenues of **$97.69 billion**, marking a growth of **$917 million** from the previous year, driven by steady demand for electric vehicles and energy solutions. * In Q2 2025, Tesla’s deliveries reached **384,000** units, marking a **29%** increase compared to the same period last year, emphasizing the company’s sustained growth and strong demand in key international markets. * In July 2021, the network reached **2,966** stations, as Tesla continued its rapid infrastructure growth to keep up with the growing number of Tesla vehicles. * In July 2019, Tesla operated **1,594** Supercharger stations, showing increasing demand for electric vehicles globally.

results.title: Service
results.content: With no regularly required maintenance and fewer moving parts to repair, we design every Tesla vehicle with the goal of eliminating the need for service. Schedule service, track repairs and message directly with your Service Center at any time with the Tesla app. Schedule service, track repairs and message directly with your Service Center at any time with the Tesla app. For anything our mobile technicians can’t fix, our Tesla Service Centers, Tesla Collision Centers and Tesla-Approved Collision Centers are available to quickly and safely make repairs.
